name: Harvest Simulator
description:
As the title say in Harvest Simulator you have to harvest a field of wheat.

You can play this game in two modes: challenge and free play.

In challenge you compete for the online high score: cut as much wheat as you can in 100 seconds.

In free mode you can relax and cut as long as you want: you also can try to create some shape in the crop, like a crop circle. 

Press esc to get back to the external camera and view your work.

- w to move forward

- space to cut

- mouse to look around

I have tried to optimize the game by not rendering all the wheat all the time, but this game can still be a little hard on the performance. The Windows version will probably run faster then the web version.
